Good Documentation

August 2007 Â· blogger, republished, wayback, documentation

Originally published on Blogger on August 17, 2007. View original article.

Archive note: Originally published on frogsbrain.blogspot.com. Republished from an archived Wayback snapshot.

I don't think it is a coincidence that my favorite development tools are so well documented. The only reason they kept my attention long enough probably has more to do with their level of documentation than their level of "coolness".

Direct links to documentation for some of my favorite tools.

  • CruiseControl.NET

  • NCover FAQ
  • NCover

  • NAnt
  • NAntContrib

  • Rhino Mocks

  • NUnit
  • MbUnit

  • NLog
  • Sooda

  • Subversion
